Parameters: ActionMode: The @B_android#view#ActionMode_E@ providing the selection mode
int: Adapter position of the item that was checked or unchecked
long: Adapter ID of the item that was checked or unchecked
boolean: true if the item is now checked, false if the item is now unchecked.
onItemCheckedStateChanged(android.view.A.Description: Called when an item is checked or unchecked during selection mode.
onItemCheckedStateChanged(android.view.A.FullName: public abstract void onItemCheckedStateChanged (ActionMode mode, int position, long id, boolean checked)

ClassDesc: A MultiChoiceModeListener receives events for @B_android#widget#AbsListView#CHOICE_MODE_MULTIPLE_MODAL_E@. It acts as the @B_android#view#ActionMode#Callback_E@ for the selection mode and also receives @B_android#widget#AbsListView#MultiChoiceModeListener#onItemCheckedStateChanged_E@ events when the user selects and deselects list items.
